bell_schedule.1: School starts at 9 AM, Recess is at 11 to 11:20 AM, Lunch is 12:20 pm to 1 pm. Dismissal for K-3 is 3 PM. Dismissal for 4-5 is 3:30 PM
bell_schedule.2: Tuesday is early release day. School starts at 9 AM, Recess is at 11 to 11:20 AM, Lunch is 12:20 pm to 1 pm. Dismissal for K-3 and 3-4 is 2:25 PM.
